textTemplates.name: Verify_Identity_Text_Template
textTemplates.text: I can help you with a password reset. First, let's verify your identity.

textTemplates.name: Email_Link_Text_Template
textTemplates.text: Thanks for that information. To reset your password, I'll email you a link. Is your email address {!Email_Variable}?

textTemplates.name: Email_Sent_Text_Template
textTemplates.text: An email is on its way. When it arrives, click the link and create a new password.

textTemplates.name: Email_Body_Text_Template
textTemplates.text: Hi {!First_Name_Variable} {!Last_Name_Variable}, We received a request to reset the password for your account. If you don’t want to reset your password, you can ignore this email and we won’t change it.

textTemplates.name: Null_Birthdate_Text_Template
textTemplates.text: Hmm, we don't have a birthdate on record to check against.

textTemplates.name: Null_Postal_Code_Text_Template
textTemplates.text: Hmm, we don't have a postal code on record to check against.

textTemplates.name: Email_Null_Text_Template
textTemplates.text: Thanks for that information. To reset your password, I'll email you a link. Can you please provide your email address?

textTemplates.name: Name_not_found_call_script
textTemplates.text: Hmm, I can't find any information for that name. Let me try again.

textTemplates.name: Customer_name_script_template
textTemplates.text: Hello, I'm {!User_Formula}. With whom am I speaking?

textTemplates.name: Birthdate_postal_not_found_call_script
textTemplates.text: We can’t reset your password at this time because we couldn’t verify your identity. Let me connect you to a supervisor to further assist.

attachment.details: query: SELECT IsTemplate, Status, IsSwingFlow, ProcessType, Description, Label, FlowDefinitionViewId, DurableId, VersionNumber FROM FlowVersionView WHERE DurableId = 'setup_service_experience__Reset_Pwd-1' ORDER BY Label LIMIT 2000
query: SELECT ProcessType, Description, Label, FlowDefinitionViewId FROM FlowVersionView WHERE DurableId = 'setup_service_experience__Reset_Pwd-1' ORDER BY Label LIMIT 2000
